title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Chunks of grilled chicken (tikka) cooked in a smooth buttery & creamy tomato based gravy.

title: Chicken Alfredo
summary: Creamy pasta dish featuring tender chicken and a rich Parmesan sauce, served over fettuccine noodles.

title: Quinoa Salad with Avocado
summary: Refreshing and nutritious salad combining quinoa, creamy avocado, cherry tomatoes, and a zesty lime dressing.
